info.name: Dire Wolf
info.description: Dire Wolves are large, powerful beasts with keen senses and a natural affinity for teamwork. They are swift, strong, and deadly hunters.

description.p: Dire Wolves are large, intelligent wolves with heightened senses and a natural ability to work in packs. They are formidable creatures, capable of taking down prey much larger than themselves.
Your character shares the following traits with other Dire Wolves.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Dire Wolves mature quickly, reaching adulthood by 2 years of age, and can live up to 25 years.
Size. Dire Wolves are large creatures. Your size is Large.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 50 feet.
Keen Hearing and Smell. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Pack Tactics. You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
Languages. You can understand Common and Sylvan, but you cannot speak.
Natural Hunter. You gain proficiency in the Stealth skill.
Powerful Build. You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
Night Vision. You have darkvision with a range of 60 feet.
